content: Hello, I just installed Zulip, but the single use link doesn't work. It just shows my unstyled base domain that I had on nginx already. Can anyone help me to find where to look to find what doesn't work? I never used puppet and it looks a bit overwhelming, i'm not sure where i can check to see if it works. In the logs I also didn't find errors
Do you have anything else installed on the same server as Zulip?
But it doesn't work now, it was running php8.0 and zulip installed php7.4, I'll have to edit the nextcloud configs to use php7.4 or zulip php8.0 if it supports it
Running Zulip on a host with other services isn't suggested or supported: https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/install-existing-server.html?highlight=puppet
Alright, then I'll roll back before I installed Zulip and try it another time. Thanks for the answers
Easiest option would be to use docker if you are running on an already installed server
